name: Glennhaven
description:
Help kingdom of Glennhaven to survive arising forces of darkness in this tower defense archery game.  Start your journey as a knight apprentice in a faraway outpost. Defend the kingdom from the waves of orks, golems, trolls, slayers and other creatures of the underworld. Collect coins for the kingdom from ork skins so that  more experienced knights can be hired to fight, waging war is not cheap you know.

Current version includes

  • Four diary entries on the war logs from the Bonehill outpost 
  • Three different knights
  • Two magic spells from the Kingdom´s wizard Shamus
